about.details:
Incorporated in 2002, Markolines Traffic Controls Limited (NPST) is a Highway Operations & Maintenance (O&M) Service providing company. The company’s operations are mainly divided into-Highway Operations (including Toll operations, Route Patrolling, and Incident management), Highway Maintenance (including e Routine Maintenance, Preventive Maintenance and Major Maintenance & Repairs (MMR)), and Specialized Maintenance Services (including Microsurfacing (MS), Base / Sub base Stabilization (FDR) and Cold In Place Recycling (CIPR)).

Since 2002, the company has executed over 90+ Highway Operations & Maintenance (O&M) projects. As of Aug’21, the company has around 285.71 km of Major Maintenance & Repairs projects for National Highways in the country. The company also has around 943.31 km of Toll Operations, Routine Maintenance, and Route Patrolling projects, for National Highways across the country. Major maintenance contributes to more than 80% of the company’s revenues

Competitive Strengths

  • One of the few Highway (O&M) service providing companies in India with a diversified portfolio of services.
  • Proven track record of winning, developing, and operating projects successfully.
  • Efficient business model and quality service delivery.
  • Established brand reputation.
  • Significant growth and improvement in order bookings.
  • Strong experienced management.

faqs.question: What is the Markolines Traffic Controls IPO?
faqs.answer:
Markolines Traffic Controls IPO is a SME IPO of 5128000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹40.00 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹78 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on September 15, 2021, and closes on September 20, 2021.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Markolines Traffic Controls IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Markolines Traffic Controls IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Markolines Traffic Controls IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Markolines Traffic Controls IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Markolines Traffic Controls IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.answer: You can apply in Markolines Traffic Controls IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Markolines Traffic Controls IPO will be done on Thursday, September 23, 2021, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, September 27, 2021. Check the Markolines Traffic Controls IPO allotment status.
